overview: Vertical Horizon was a staple of the 1990s college rock circuit, and their "Tour Book '99-'01" is a feast for the eyes and ears. A scrapbook that spans over those two tumultuous years in the life of the group, Tour Book includes live concert footage as well as candid behind-the-scenes clips and entertaining interviews with the talented quartet. Tracks include "Everything You Want," "Send It Up" and "We Are."
title: Vertical Horizon: Tour Book '99 - '01
